title: Mezze Hummus and Falafel
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Buffet, Fast food, Salad bar, Delivery, Take-out, Middle Eastern
description: Opened winter 2013, offers vegetarian and vegan snacks. Has just a few tables inside and a small garden area outside. Small menu including falafel in a pita, mezze plate with pita, hummus, babaganoush, garlic paste, labane zatar and more. In addition, a salad bar filled with olives, tomatoes, pickled turnips, broccoli and lots of other veggies is available. Entire menu is gluten free, except pita.
